channel.title: What tutorial do you want?
channel.description:
Hello moparscape community.
I'm sorry if i shouldn't post this here, but i didn't think it was in place to go any where else, and since this is kind of development i think it was in place to go here.
I basically made this thread to see what tutorial people want? Because i am considering making a tutorial (proper one) but i need to know what people want, i were going to make a quest one, but since the questhandler is not mine i don't know if i should post? (I created the quest i would use as an example, explaining)
Anyways, post back. Thanks
[url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=299427;sa=summary]WRX`[/url]

item.title: What tutorial do you want?
item.dc:creator: @lulz_pker lulz_pker

how to add an Saradomin Sword pl0x

item.title: What tutorial do you want?
item.dc:creator: @loading159 loading159
item.description:
@loading159 wrote:

Maybe it’s a little bit personal But i searched for a long time and i want to add saradomin sword and i’ve got no idea to make it a 2h weapon lik ed 2h, or to add a emote to the attack… So if somebody knwo this mayb epm m eor post it here. And maybe that woul dbe a great idea for a tut to… ‘How to add a emote to a weapon?’

Maybe it is allready in tut… But i never find it… : /

Read full topic

item.title: What tutorial do you want?
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

[quote=“zero fly, post:7, topic:226477”]::mute and ::unmute a spawn code line so ppl cant multispawn the summon pets:P
Working ::jail and ::unjail[/quote]

I don’t think these are tutorials.
These would belong in the development section.
I wanna make a tut
I’m making tut island now anyways.

Read full topic

starting it now, going fine so far =)

item.title: What tutorial do you want?
item.dc:creator: @LeechYourStuffPlease LeechYourStuffPlease
item.description:
@LeechYourStuffPlease wrote:

Well, Not really a whole Island
Just something that blocks you from talking,yelling,or anything Like so you can’t spam the server out until you go threw a portal TO help block Allgofreebot lol

item.title: What tutorial do you want?
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

Tutorial island?
Hmm, sounds good. I might test it on my server, then I’ll make a tutorial if it goes well.

Any more suggestions before i start testing tutorial island?

WRX`

item.title: What tutorial do you want?
item.dc:creator: @LeechYourStuffPlease LeechYourStuffPlease
item.description:
@LeechYourStuffPlease wrote:

A. A Ip Ban Command That sets up paths, Many People Want That
B. Something that makes like a tutorial Island to were when you log on you have to go threw a portal before saying/doing/clicking anything
To stop spammers Lol

Read full topic
